title: How to use GetTDData
text: Suppose need financial data (prices yields) bond type LTN maturity date equal 2016-01-01. bullet bond basic debt contract Brazilian government issues. pay value (coupon) lifetime pay 1000 R$ maturity. order get data, need run following code R: Let’s plot prices check code worked:  expected, prices bond converge face value, 1000 R$, maturity date (2016-01-01). can also look time-varying annual yield:  functions GetTDData also work multiple arguments asset.codes maturity. Suppose wanted look prices available maturities bonds type LTN. need add value NULL argument maturity: data downloaded, can plot prices different debt contracts:
code: library(GetTDData)  asset.codes <- 'LTN'   # Identifier of assets  maturity <- '010116'  # Maturity date as string (ddmmyy) cache_folder <- paste0(tempdir(), '/TD_cache')  my.flag <- download.TD.data(asset.codes = asset.codes,                              dl.folder = cache_folder) ## Warning in download.TD.data(asset.codes = asset.codes, dl.folder = ## cache_folder): Folder /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache was not found. Creating a it.. ##  ## Downloading file /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2005.xls (1-18) Downloading... ## Downloading file /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2006.xls (2-18) Downloading... ## Downloading file /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2007.xls (3-18) Downloading... ## Downloading file /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2008.xls (4-18) Downloading... ## Downloading file /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2009.xls (5-18) Downloading... ## Downloading file /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2010.xls (6-18) Downloading... ## Downloading file /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2011.xls (7-18) Downloading... ## Downloading file /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2012.xls (8-18) Downloading... ## Downloading file /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2013.xls (9-18) Downloading... ## Downloading file /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2014.xls (10-18) Downloading... ## Downloading file /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2015.xls (11-18) Downloading... ## Downloading file /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2016.xls (12-18) Downloading... ## Downloading file /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2017.xls (13-18) Downloading... ## Downloading file /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2018.xls (14-18) Downloading... ## Downloading file /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2019.xls (15-18) Downloading... ## Downloading file /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2020.xls (16-18) Downloading... ## Downloading file /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2021.xls (17-18) Downloading... ## Downloading file /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2022.xls (18-18) Downloading... my.df <- read.TD.files(asset.codes = asset.codes,                         dl.folder = cache_folder,                        maturity = maturity,) ##  ## Reading xls data and saving to data.frame ##  Reading File = /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2005.xls ##     Cant find maturities in file  /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2005.xls ##  Reading File = /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2006.xls ##     Cant find maturities in file  /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2006.xls ##  Reading File = /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2007.xls ##     Cant find maturities in file  /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2007.xls ##  Reading File = /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2008.xls ##     Cant find maturities in file  /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2008.xls ##  Reading File = /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2009.xls ##     Cant find maturities in file  /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2009.xls ##  Reading File = /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2010.xls ##     Cant find maturities in file  /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2010.xls ##  Reading File = /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2011.xls ##     Cant find maturities in file  /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2011.xls ##  Reading File = /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2012.xls ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010116 ##  Reading File = /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2013.xls ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010116 ##  Reading File = /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2014.xls ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010116 ##  Reading File = /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2015.xls ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010116 ##  Reading File = /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2016.xls ##     Cant find maturities in file  /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2016.xls ##  Reading File = /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2017.xls ##     Cant find maturities in file  /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2017.xls ##  Reading File = /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2018.xls ##     Cant find maturities in file  /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2018.xls ##  Reading File = /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2019.xls ##     Cant find maturities in file  /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2019.xls ##  Reading File = /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2020.xls ##     Cant find maturities in file  /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2020.xls ##  Reading File = /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2021.xls ##     Cant find maturities in file  /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2021.xls ##  Reading File = /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2022.xls ##     Cant find maturities in file  /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2022.xls library(ggplot2)  p <- ggplot(data = my.df, aes(x = as.Date(ref.date), y = price.bid, color = asset.code)) p <- p + geom_line(size = 1) + scale_x_date() + labs(title = '', x = 'Dates') print(p) p <- ggplot(data = my.df, aes(x = as.Date(ref.date), y = yield.bid, color = asset.code)) p <- p + geom_line(size = 1) + scale_x_date()+ labs(title = '', x = 'Dates' ) print(p) library(GetTDData) library(ggplot2)  asset.codes <- 'LTN'   # Name of asset maturity <- NULL      # = NULL, downloads all maturities  # download data my.flag <- download.TD.data(asset.codes = asset.codes,                              dl.folder = cache_folder,                             do.clean.up = F) ##  ## Downloading file /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2005.xls (1-18) Found file in folder, skipping it. ## Downloading file /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2006.xls (2-18) Found file in folder, skipping it. ## Downloading file /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2007.xls (3-18) Found file in folder, skipping it. ## Downloading file /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2008.xls (4-18) Found file in folder, skipping it. ## Downloading file /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2009.xls (5-18) Found file in folder, skipping it. ## Downloading file /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2010.xls (6-18) Found file in folder, skipping it. ## Downloading file /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2011.xls (7-18) Found file in folder, skipping it. ## Downloading file /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2012.xls (8-18) Found file in folder, skipping it. ## Downloading file /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2013.xls (9-18) Found file in folder, skipping it. ## Downloading file /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2014.xls (10-18) Found file in folder, skipping it. ## Downloading file /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2015.xls (11-18) Found file in folder, skipping it. ## Downloading file /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2016.xls (12-18) Found file in folder, skipping it. ## Downloading file /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2017.xls (13-18) Found file in folder, skipping it. ## Downloading file /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2018.xls (14-18) Found file in folder, skipping it. ## Downloading file /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2019.xls (15-18) Found file in folder, skipping it. ## Downloading file /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2020.xls (16-18) Found file in folder, skipping it. ## Downloading file /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2021.xls (17-18) Found file in folder, skipping it. ## Downloading file /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2022.xls (18-18) Downloading... # reads data my.df <- read.TD.files(asset.codes = asset.codes,                         dl.folder = cache_folder,                        maturity = maturity) ##  ## Reading xls data and saving to data.frame ##  Reading File = /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2005.xls ##     Reading Sheet LTN 040105 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010405 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010705 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 011005 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010106 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010406 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010706 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 011006 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010107 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010407 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010707 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010108 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010708 ##  Reading File = /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2006.xls ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010406 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010706 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 011006 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010107 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010407 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010707 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 011007 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010108 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010408 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010708 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010109 ##  Reading File = /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2007.xls ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010407 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010707 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 011007 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010108 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010408 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010708 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 011008 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010109 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010709 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 011009 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010110 ##  Reading File = /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2008.xls ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010408 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010708 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 011008 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010109 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010409 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010709 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 011009 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010110 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010710 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010111 ##  Reading File = /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2009.xls ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010409 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010709 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 011009 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010110 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010710 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010111 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010112 ##  Reading File = /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2010.xls ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010710 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010111 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010711 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010112 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010113 ##  Reading File = /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2011.xls ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010711 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010112 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010113 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010114 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010115 ##  Reading File = /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2012.xls ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010113 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010114 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010115 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010116 ##  Reading File = /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2013.xls ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010114 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010115 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010116 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010117 ##  Reading File = /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2014.xls ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010115 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010116 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010117 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010118 ##  Reading File = /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2015.xls ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010116 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010117 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010118 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010121 ##  Reading File = /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2016.xls ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010117 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010118 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010119 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010121 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010123 ##  Reading File = /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2017.xls ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010118 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010119 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010120 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010121 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010123 ##  Reading File = /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2018.xls ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010119 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010120 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010121 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010123 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010125 ##  Reading File = /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2019.xls ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010120 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010121 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010122 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010123 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010125 ##  Reading File = /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2020.xls ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010121 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010122 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010123 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010125 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010126 ##  Reading File = /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2021.xls ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010122 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010123 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010724 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010125 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010126 ##  Reading File = /tmp/RtmpzX6wBK/TD_cache/LTN_2022.xls ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010123 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010724 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010125 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010126 ##     Reading Sheet LTN 010129 # plot data (prices) p <- ggplot(data = my.df,              aes(x = as.Date(ref.date), y = price.bid, color = asset.code)) +    geom_line() + scale_x_date() + labs(title = '', x = 'Dates', y = 'Prices' )  print(p) # plot data (yields) p <- ggplot(data = my.df,              aes(x = as.Date(ref.date), y = yield.bid, color = asset.code)) +    geom_line() + scale_x_date() + labs(title = '', x = 'Dates', y = 'Yields' )  print(p)

title: Downloading the Current Yield Curve
text: can plot derised result:
code: library(GetTDData)  df.yield <- get.yield.curve()   str(df.yield) ## 'data.frame':    117 obs. of  5 variables: ##  $ n.biz.days  : num  126 252 378 504 630 ... ##  $ type        : chr  "real_return" "real_return" "real_return" "real_return" ... ##  $ value       : num  5.7 5.74 5.53 5.38 5.29 ... ##  $ ref.date    : Date, format: "2022-10-06" "2023-04-10" ... ##  $ current.date: Date, format: "2022-04-07" "2022-04-07" ... library(ggplot2)  p <- ggplot(df.yield, aes(x=ref.date, y = value) ) +   geom_line(size=1) + geom_point() + facet_grid(~type, scales = 'free') +    labs(title = paste0('The current Brazilian Yield Curve '),        subtitle = paste0('Date: ', df.yield$current.date[1]))       print(p)

title: Authors and Citation
text: Marcelo Perlin. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Perlin M (2022). GetTDData: Get Data Brazilian Bonds (Tesouro Direto). https://github.com/msperlin/GetTDData/, https://msperlin.github.io/GetTDData/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {GetTDData: Get Data for Brazilian Bonds (Tesouro Direto)},   author = {Marcelo Perlin},   year = {2022},   note = {https://github.com/msperlin/GetTDData/, https://msperlin.github.io/GetTDData/}, }

what: Get Data for Brazilian Bonds (Tesouro Direto)
title: Get Data for Brazilian Bonds (Tesouro Direto)
text: Information regarding prices yields bonds issued Brazilian government can downloaded manually excel files Tesouro Direto website. However, can painful aggregate data something useful files don’t uniform format divided year asset code. Package GetTDData makes process importing data Tesouro direto much easier. need order download data name assets (LFT, LTN, NTN-C, NTN-B, NTN-B Principal, NTN-F) desired dates maturity (e.g. 2016-01-01).

title: Get Data for Brazilian Bonds (Tesouro Direto)
code: # from CRAN (stable version) install.package('GetTDData')  # from github (development version) devtools::install_github('msperlin/GetTDData')

title: Get Data for Brazilian Bonds (Tesouro Direto)
text: See documentation page https://msperlin.github.io/GetTDData/.

what: Downloads data of Brazilian government bonds directly from the website — download.TD.data
title: Downloads data of Brazilian government bonds directly from the website — download.TD.data
text: function looks tesouro direto website (https://www.tesourodireto.com.br/) downloads files containing prices yields government bonds. can use input asset.codes restrict downloads specific bonds

title: Downloads data of Brazilian government bonds directly from the website — download.TD.data
code: download.TD.data(   asset.codes = "LTN",   dl.folder = "TD Files",   do.clean.up = F,   do.overwrite = F,   n.dl = NULL )

title: Downloads data of Brazilian government bonds directly from the website — download.TD.data
text: asset.codes Strings identify assets (1 assets) names excel files. E.g. asset.codes = 'LTN'. set NULL, download available assets dl.folder Name folder save excel files tesouro direto (create exists) .clean.Clean folder downloading? (TRUE FALSE) .overwrite Overwrite excel files? (TRUE FALSE). FALSE, download new data current year n.dl Sets many files download website. Used decrease CRAN CHECK time. default value NULL (downloads files)

title: Downloads data of Brazilian government bonds directly from the website — download.TD.data
text: TRUE successful

title: Downloads data of Brazilian government bonds directly from the website — download.TD.data
code: # only download file where string LTN is found # (only 1 file for simplicity) if (FALSE) { download.TD.data(asset.codes = 'LTN', n.dl = 1) } # The excel file should be available in folder 'TD Files' (default name)

what: Gets the current yield curve — get.yield.curve
title: Gets the current yield curve — get.yield.curve
text: Downloads parses information current Brazilian yield curve.

title: Gets the current yield curve — get.yield.curve
Gets the current yield curve — get.yield.curve
text: dataframe information yield curve

title: Gets the current yield curve — get.yield.curve

what: Reading excel files from Tesouro Direto — read.TD.files
title: Reading excel files from Tesouro Direto — read.TD.files
text: Reads files downloaded download.TD.data

title: Reading excel files from Tesouro Direto — read.TD.files
code: read.TD.files(   dl.folder = "TD Files",   asset.codes = NULL,   maturity = NULL,   cols.to.import = c(1, 2, 4),   col.names = c("ref.date", "yield.bid", "price.bid") )

title: Reading excel files from Tesouro Direto — read.TD.files
text: dl.folder Folder excel files tesouro direto asset.codes Strings identify assets (1 assets) names excel files. E.g. asset.codes = 'LTN'. set NULL, download available assets maturity character vector desired maturities (format ddmmyy, e.g. "010116"). set NULL, download maturities asset codes cols..import Columns (numeric) import excel files (open check columns excel file tesouro direto details) col.names Names columns final data.frame (size cols..import)

title: Reading excel files from Tesouro Direto — read.TD.files
text: dataframe data

title: Reading excel files from Tesouro Direto — read.TD.files
code: # Downloads data from tesouro direto (only 1 file for simplicity)  dl.folder ='TD Files'  if (FALSE) { download.TD.data(asset.codes = 'LTN', dl.folder = dl.folder, n.dl = 1)  my.df <- read.TD.files(dl.folder = dl.folder, maturity ='010117') }

title: Version 1.5 (2022-04-XX)
text: improved github actions adding codecov, pkgdown LICENSE added new tests functions

title: Version 1.4.5 (2022-04-06)
text: CRAN release: 2022-04-06 Fixed issue download related product NTN-principal issue #8 removed “Date” DESCRIPTION file (seems standard now) increases min R version DESCRIPTION 4.0.0 improved github actions adding codecov pkgdown

title: Version 1.4.4 (2022-03-02)
text: CRAN release: 2022-03-02 Fixed issue cran check oldrel (use new pipeline operator, available prior R < 4.1)

title: Version 1.4.3 (2022-02-18)
text: CRAN release: 2022-02-21 Major change urls Tesouro Direto (See issue #5) Fixed issue get.yield.curve() Fixed issue yields equal 0 (see issue #3)

title: Version 1.4.2 (2019-10-01)
text: CRAN release: 2019-10-01 Found alternative address Anbima. (see issue #1)

title: Version 1.4.1 (2019-07-11)
text: CRAN release: 2019-07-15 Fixed bug yield function (anbima site …). Need find alternative.

title: Version 1.4 (2019-04-02)
text: CRAN release: 2019-04-02 Fixed bug name importing spreadsheets Prices yield now cleaned (values equal zero)

title: Version 1.3 (2017-09-14)
text: CRAN release: 2017-09-14 Added function downloading current yield curve Anbima Fixed typos vignettes dev version now github fixed bug names NTN-Principal

title: Version 1.2.5 (2016-11-07)
text: CRAN release: 2016-11-08 Added maturities instruments extra column dataframe

title: Version 1.2.4 (2016-08-15)
text: CRAN release: 2016-08-16 package CHECK process longer depends avaibility Tesouro Direto website. needed files now local

title: Version 1.2.3 (2016-05-22)
text: CRAN release: 2016-05-24 Fixed bug html download. Now using new function new algorithm try download 10 times throwing error

title: Version 1.2.2 (2016-05-22)
text: CRAN release: 2016-05-22 html structure Tesouro Website changed resulted CHECK errors package. update fixed . Fixed TD names read function (TD website mess!) Now also using input asset.codes read function

title: Version 1.2.1 (2016-05-04)
text: CRAN release: 2016-05-04
code: - Fixed bug in read.td.files (it was not reading data after 2012 because of change of output type given switch from xlsx:read.xlsx to readxl::read_excel)

title: Version 1.2 (2016-04-29)
text: CRAN release: 2016-04-30
code: - Now using readxl::read_excel, a better excel reader, FASTER and without the java requirements - Additional error checks

title: Version 1.1.0 (2016-04-12)
code: - Added a test for internet connection - Added a new option for overwriting or not the downloaded excel files (saves a lot of time for large batch downloads!) - Fixed typos and improved the text in the vignette
